We make it incredibly simple to buy and sell Bitcoin via a crypto automated teller machine (BTM). Once Cryptocurrency is purchased, it's turned into a bitcoin token, held in your wallet, and identified by various letters and numbers. If you want to send Bitcoin to another person or enter your private wallet, you'll need to use your private keys to access it. Besides exchanging money with friends, cryptocurrency can be used to pay for things with anonymity, with all transactions being 100% secure. Find nearest Bitcoin ATM Paydepot Bitcoin ATM features Easy and Fast When you want to purchase Bitcoin, you're no longer stuck to credit card processing or bank transfers. If you're looking for a way to buy or sell Bitcoin for cash without having to wait days for the transaction to complete, PayDepot provides the perfect solution with our high-end ATM Bitcoin technology. Our transactions are completed quickly and efficiently. Well-Located PayDepot has more than 250 BTC ATMs nearby popular locations across the United States, creating a convenient cryptocurrency transaction for our customers. High Privacy and Security Standards Top-Notch Client Service We have one of the highest-rated client service networks in the cryptocurrency industry. If you have any issues or questions regarding BTC terminals operation, you can contact us at any time. We have tons of online resources to help you get started and answer any questions you may have about using our crypto ATMs. Multiple Cryptocurrencies Offered Paydepot allows you to buy and sell different cryptocurrencies - our Crypto ATM terminals support the following cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dash (DASH), Litecoin (LTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH). Live Customer Support We strive to provide excellent customer support. Feel free to call us or email support@paydepot.com +1 855-558-6580 How Bitcoin ATM works for a customer Get verified 1 Once at the kiosk, customers verify themselves by providing a phone number and/or an ID depending on the transaction size. Scan their wallet Customers can either print a new paper wallet or scan a QR code address from their mobile Bitcoin wallet. Insert cash 3 Customers insert cash to purchase Bitcoin. MACHINES ARE CASH ONLY Complete After all cash has been inserted, the machine will either print or email a transaction receipt. It's as simple as that! Learn more What is a Bitcoin ATM? Bitcoin ATM is an automated terminal that allows a customer to exchange cryptocurrencies to USD cash and other fiat currencies (depending on their country and region). Any person can buy Bitcoin using an automatic teller machine - crypto ATM. There are two types of Bitcoin ATMs - the first ones allow you to buy Bitcoins and other cryptocurrencies for cash, and the others (2 way Bitcoin ATMs) offer bi-directional operation, enabling the purchase of Bitcoin as well as the sale of Bitcoin for cash transactions. Bitcoin terminals are similar to regular ATMs but they can exchange crypto currencies thanks to a special software - crypto ATMs software. Bitcoin ATM kiosks are connected to the Internet, allowing the insertion of cash in exchange for Bitcoin, which is transacted to the account of the customer - crypto wallet All-in-One Solution Platform Crypto ATMs Find all cryptocurrency ATM terminals Nationwide on our interactive google map. Buy / Sell Cryptocurrency Buy and sell popular digital currencies, keep track of them in one place. Keep track of all transactions through our trusted block explorer and crypto transaction search engine. Crypto Wallet App Download our app wallet and seamlessly add cryptocurrency to your investment portfolio. Crypto OTC desk Buy and sell large amounts of Bitcoin, Ethereum and other cryptocurrencies.
